name: Coffee flavor of love 咖啡甜恋
name_original: Coffee flavor of love 咖啡甜恋
description:
A sweet love that began in a coffee shop.
One is lively and lively, the other is mysterious and gentle.
How do you choose?


Role introduction：

An apprentice Barista.He doesn't work very hard and often plays smart.


Trainee pastry chef.With a gentle character and a sense of mystery.


A lively guy. She hesitated between the postgraduate entrance examination and blind date marriage.


Next door youth. The relationship with the hero is very good.


Coffee shop owner. He is a very strict person, both to the coffee and to the staff.


Baozi shop owner. He was envious of the coffee shop business and wanted to join.
